alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 3:07PM AKST until February 07 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 50 below. Winds gusting to 50 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 50 below. * WHERE...Near the Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are not as strong and conditions are much less severe over St Lawrence Island.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
